member.name: M:Fake.Core.TaskRunner.runWithRetries``1(Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpFunc{Microsoft.FSharp.Core.Unit,``0},System.Int32)
member.summary:
Retries the given function until a retry limit is reached or the function succeeds without exception. ## Parameters
- `f` - This function will be started. - `retries` - A retry limit.

member.name: M:Fake.Core.TaskRunner.waitFor(Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpFunc{Microsoft.FSharp.Core.Unit,System.Boolean},System.TimeSpan,System.Int32,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.FSharpFunc{Microsoft.FSharp.Core.Unit,Microsoft.FSharp.Core.Unit})
member.summary:
Waits until the given function returns true or the timeout is reached. ## Parameters
- `f` - This function will be started. - `timeout` - A System.TimeSpan representing the timeout. - `testMS` - An interval at which FAKE checks if the function has succeeded. - `timeoutF` - This function will be run if the timeout has been reached.

member.name: T:Fake.Core.TaskRunner
member.summary: Contains a helper which can be used to implement timeouts and retries.
